name: CARnage (itch) (The Danicon Show)
description:
Let the CARnage, begin!

You're a Taximercenary, hell-bent on collecting fairs and dropping them where ever they need to go! CARnage is a battle where you'll annihilate the competition with weapons in your chosen combat vehicle for a big cash payout!

CONTROLS

Control scheme can be viewed in the options menu.

You can change between Xbox controller or Keyboard.

Keyboard keys:

Left and Right keys to turn. 

Up to accelerate.

Space to fire.

X to cancel, back in menus
